details.sectionContent: This event is about technical skills and knowledge. A combination of fun and knowledge.
The event is based on the technical knowledge of electronics components. Last round will be a surprise round from which the participants will gain knowledge about promient electronics software.

This is basically a Technical Dumb-Charades. One of the team member will be given a particular time in which one of the participant has to pick up the chit and act to describe a component. The other team member has to guess the component within 2 minutes. The team who guess maximum components will go to next round

This round is basically an escape room.The team will  solve a simple mathematical equation and set the mirrors in a angle to get perfect reflection by this the buzzer will buzz. After this, an another envelope will be given to team. By solving the simple circuit, the passcode will be generated which will help to escape the room by defusing the bomb attached to the door. This is an elimination round so who will escape the room in least time will proceed to next round.
Multisim will be taught by expert and then same circuit will be implemented on beadboard.
